Nitobi.XmlDataHandler

Nitobi.XmlDataHandler Class Reference

This is the main class for providing data for all of the Nitobi controls that bind to rows of data in a data source. More...

Detailed Description

This is the main class for providing data for all of the Nitobi controls that bind to rows of data in a data source.
